definition: a passage or expression that is quoted or cited, put quote marks around
details:
noun
- a passage or expression that is quoted or cited
= synonyms: quotation
- a punctuation mark used to attribute the enclosed text to someone else
= synonyms: quotation mark, inverted comma
verb
- put quote marks around
- repeat a passage from
= example: repeat a passage from
= synonyms: cite
- refer to for illustration or proof
= example: refer to for illustration or proof
= synonyms: cite
- name the price of
= example: name the price of
